author: Marty Johnson
title: Former Michigan governor on protests: The 'selfishness must stop'
description: Former Michigan Gov. Jennifer Granholm (D) on Saturday called the people in Michigan who protested Gov. Gretchen Whitmer's (D) extended stay-at-home order earlier in the week amid the COVID-19 pandemic selfish.
content:
Former Michigan Gov. Jennifer Granholm (D) on Saturday called the people in Michigan who protested Gov. Gretchen Whitmer's (D) extended stay-at-home order earlier in the week amid the COVID-19 pandemic selfish.
"They were putting people at risk. That selfish… [+1410 chars]
